reviews:
So far so good! 🌬 Working good and showing correct info. The UI and especially the round widget looks really beautiful. I have a request. *EDIT: Thanks for listening to my request to add default clock in "tap on clock" option from settings* 5 stars here. 🌞🌨🌈🌧🌤 Thank you for considering the request, hope this beautiful app will never be bloated in future. Thank you :)   Full Review   
 GulfJet Graphics 5 Stars, accuracy 2 stars. You report SNOW BLIZZARD where is NONE. The temperature is off most of the time. It's a pity. Take a close look at your Wx provider. I do like the program, but it should deliver the Wx as accurate as possible. Kind regards .... Well, the program still reported "Snow Blizzard" with a Outside Temp. 06°C. I live on the south side of the Jura mountain at 840 meters in Switzerland, maybe this helps a bit. Graphics 5 Stars🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟   Full Review   
  After downloading this app I found that you have deducted an extra amount of Rs. 50/-  from my account. First an amount of Rs.10/- deducted and after few minutes again an amount of Rs.50/- was deducted. Why this cheating from the customer?   Full Review   
 These app suks The worst app I've ever purchased why does the widget not working when i put a widget on the home screen theres no weather coming out pls. Fix these ok   Full Review   
 Weather Live Apalon app Great weather app for Android. Like the layout & ability to see weather in many places all together in one place. (iOS app can show a temperature graph for the day but this one doesn't). A very good app even though forecast is out sometimes!   Full Review   
 No. Hate the red clouds background when skies are grey during day time. Please add a grey clouds background and remove that hideous red cloud apocalypse garbage.  It makes cloudy days worse.   Full Review   
 Fairly accurate most the time unlike like the other weather apps I'm currently running two separate apps on my phone for weather and this one is definitely better and more accurate.   Full Review   
 Best weather application! This is a great application for all weather enthusiasts. The best one I have used with up to date reports as well as a beautiful widget choice for all likes. I  would highly recommend this application to anybody looking for a very informative and great working weather application.   Full Review   
 Galaxy S5 City is always changing. I'm 8 hrs from Minneapolis, MN but I got their weather. I thought it was something I was doing wrong. The information is inaccurate outside of 15 degrees.  I would not suggest this app.  Especially don't buy until you're sure, but that's with everthing. Good luck   Full Review   
 Seems better Than when posted last year so increased rating.  Could do with some more widget styles and also when click on clock should take you straight to clock not the app for you to click again   Full Review   
 Great! Great app! Attractive interface, accurate forecasts... What more could you want!   Full Review   
 Great app Accurate, looks good on the whole, forecast too small.  Would be good to show location in the widget.   Full Review   
  Pretty, but useless. The app and widget do not work correctly if you have a battery saver or anti-virus installed. This was told to me by their own customer support. Why should I have to turn off my battery saver to use their program?  There are plenty of free options out there. I feel like I am owed a refund. Stay away.   Full Review   
 Good looking and accurate The widget does look very sophisticate and it is very precise with the information that displays. Love it   Full Review   
 accurate and beautiful wonderful app. worth the money   Full Review   
 So Simple,  yet so much. This app is a very simple one to use,  but has a lot of widgets.  I love it,  with its nice layout,  and simple design. The images change according to the weather and time of day. Worth the $0.99   Full Review   
 Good... but could be Great My biggest problem with it is the live weather wallpaper is not current with the weather i am having ..I have to restart my galaxy s7 to get accurate wallpaper.  Also it does not list the town where I live it picks up a city 4 towns away thats the weather i  have to go by. The style is very good and i like the widgets but still needs improvements ..   Full Review   
 Looking forward to use this app I've used the free version and I wasn't disappointed. Now it's time to put the live wallpaper to the test.   Full Review   
 memory hog, leaks My S5 was unresponsive so I found that live wallpaper was consuming 500MB RAM. Removed that, but using widget still was consuming around 250MB. I uninstalled it for now. Please mem profile and fix :-)   Full Review   
 Add a Future Radar Cast & I'll love it Beautiful layout and look. The accuracy is great too. There is a lot going for this app. It's well worth the price for the full features. Unfortunately I have had to keep a second weather app because a major feature is missing. I took a star off because there is no future radar cast. That is a feature that would increase the rating to 5 stars for me. Hopefully that can be added in a future update soon. I'd love to only have one weather app that does it all!   Full Review   
 Mr Chris Reeve A very good app can't really fault it . Does the job   Full Review   
 Not as good as I thought. What is with it only updating every 30 mins???? Temps & weather changes faster than that. The graphics don't keep up either obviously. Why can't it be every 10 mins like the rest?? Wish I hadn't bought the full version, otherwise I would uninstall. Don't like wasting money   Full Review   
 Junk Detailed forecasts are worthless when the app can't get he location correct.   Full Review   
  nice widget the one I was looking for.well how to add all the parameter default only 4 are there   Full Review   
 Disappointed The app like to show the extremely wrong weather conditions suchlike heavy snow in my location for 2 days already. Really like the widget but please fix the accuracy. I'm in Staaken Berlin Germany by the way.   Full Review   
 Great app! Clean user interface. Accurate and easy to use. Keep up the great work devs.   Full Review   
 Great app Love this app. The devs are really quick to respond and are very helpful. The 'full' version on Amazon underground carries ads for Amazon (a full version with ads?)  which cause it to crash. Get the *proper* full version here.   Full Review   
 So far so good Not long installed app , hopefully it holds up.   Full Review   
 Great for weather I use this app every day sometimes multiple times   Full Review   
  Sitting in a virtual monsoon should've brought a coat!...freezing rain, has been all day ..But not according to you. From Chester, Cheshire   Full Review   
 Good App Wanted a good looking widget that displays hourly weather and time, this worked great   Full Review   
 I really like this app I wish there was a way to change the front page of the app itself.   Full Review   
 Why only 3 stars ? I've only given 3 stars because it looks amazing but the weather info is very inaccurate. Maybe a good idea if we could choose who the info came from. Like some other apps.   Full Review   
  Says "network error occurred" but my Internet is fine. Such a disappointment for a pretty app. Update: Reboot worked! Thanks!   Full Review   
 It does the job Have it on my Nvidia Shield, so far so good   Full Review   
 Good little app Does what's expected.  Good graphics.   Full Review   
 Seems good So far so good. But a bit inaccurate   Full Review   
 Good, solid app! It's not as customizable as my last free app, but it's got more important features like barometric pressure, rain totals, etc. I also haven't seen any ads yet which is totally worth a buck!!   Full Review   
 Missing important information I live in an extremely hot and sunny area, I was hoping this app would have the max daily UV index in it so I could prepare myself, otherwise it's a great app. Hope to see this feature soon.   Full Review   
 Not bad Lovely design, temp is good. Really good looking widget.   Full Review
title: Weather Live

reviews:
Looks great but stopped working Really love it. But now it simply stopped working. It is just stuck on a black background not changing or moving or anything. I keep having to restart it. Sort of pointless to do that for a background. Nexus 6p.   Full Review   
 Great concept, but could have been done better in my opinion. You can only choose from a few layouts, all of which consist of pretty much the same few objects, shifted around. It would be nice to be able to choose from 2 or 3 sets of shapes instead of being stuck to a flower that's petals shift around. The app's setting also seem confusing. It would be helpful to see explanations for what some of the sliders do.   Full Review   
 Worth the money This has to be 1 of the coolest live wallpapers on the market works flawlessly on my LG G4 it is awesome lots of customisation   Full Review   
 Beautiful Performance on Note 4 Lollipop Brilliant, realtime camera adaptation is magnificent to behold in this wallpaper. Going into the wallpaper's settings lets you adjust how often the camera refreshes, how often the layout animates, and how quickly it animates. Frankly, the out-of-the-box settings are so visually enticing that you may want to tone them down so that you can actually do whatever it was you wanted to do on your device! Well done, dev. Certainly worth three times the price.   Full Review   
 Very cool app I love this app. I'm showing it off all the time. This is a terrific way to personalize your phone.   Full Review   
 Awesome Awesome is the word to describe this app. It needs improvement in adapting the exact color, but still I'll give it a 5 star.   Full Review   
 Love it Only one thing frustrates me. PLEASE ADD AN OPTION TO DISABLE DOUPLE TAP TO REFRESH OR TO DISABLE THE USE OF THE CAMERA COMPLETELY. Whenever I swipe through my screens the layout and colors change, and this frustrates me because it's using the camera which means more battery wasted. The last two refresh options say "no camera" but this isn't true for either of them because the camera is still used if it registers a double tap, even if it's just from swiping through your screens. 4 stars until then.   Full Review   
 Doesn't work with Nova launcher S6 Says "Application not installed"   Full Review   
 My favorite wallpaper app I like this for a number of reasons. It follows the Material Design theme. It's customizable. My icons and widgets are fully visible over the wallpaper. Also it doesn't seem to drain battery from my s6 Active.   Full Review   
 Yep. Beautiful app Looks amazingly cool on my note 4.   Full Review   
  Amazing but the camera is portrait. Please make it to real camera settings   Full Review   
 Worked for about 3 month It just stop working. I kind of regret spending my money on it now.   Full Review   
  Nice, but uses too much processor and battery   Full Review   
 Wow This it a pretty unique LWP. A+   Full Review   
 Nice It's the first time I buy a lwp love it   Full Review   
 Chmeleleon Wow! This is a got a have it NOW!!!!   Full Review   
 Bug Too many bugs on zenfone 2   Full Review   
  The Best   Full Review   
  This app doesn't work properly on s4 waste of money   Full Review   
 Wow Just wow   Full Review   
 Refund my money Crashing in my phone. Kindly refund my money.   Full Review   
 great idea buuuuut... it doesn't work very well on my s4 gti9500   Full Review   
 Nearly 5* But realtime not working   Full Review   
 beautiful . nice idea and well done.   Full Review   
 Plus one Works great. Still get some crashes, if I launch an app while it's still changing.  For a request, I'd like to be able to save a color scheme. Maybe a triple tap. Also, an option for two finger tap, so it doesn't change colors when I open a shutter in action launcher.  Thanks!   Full Review   
 Best Lwp In The World Please add 20 more layout or color add option to choose manual color to every part   Full Review   
  I will give a 4 star when force close stops on my nexus 6   Full Review   
 It actually works ! It works exactly as listed. I have had some minor crashing errors, but once I disabled the changing of the pattern by touching it helped.   Full Review   
 Thank you 😊😊 The update fixed all the crashes I was having on my note 4   Full Review   
 Amazing but Please fix settings, can't read anything. Just big and bold squares as the words and letters (still happening after reset)   Full Review   
 Nice Very nice amazing   Full Review   
  What a unique and neat idea!  Curious to see what it does to the battery life though.   Full Review   
  Its very awasome amazing   Full Review   
 Unique app It's impress my friends a lot   Full Review   
 LG G4 Probably the most unusual live wallpapers out there but a great one works well so 5*,is there a way of locking in a colour scheme you like, updated i can't use double tap as it locks my G4 screen and i just get a black screen instead?, I dont want my camera on all the time because of battery drain!   Full Review   
 One of the more original wallpaper apps OK, first off KEVIN CHAN - Your mom is gimmicky. That's barely even an actual word, you degenerate reprobate. Questionable permissions. Seriously. The NSA don't care about you. You're just another insignificant tool. OUTSTANDING APP. EASILY WORTH THE MODEST FEE. As an enthusiastic personalization app purchaser, I try and buy (and refund) a lot of apps every week and this one definitely ranks in my top 5 of 2015. Good work, Dev. Now, time to spread the word...   Full Review   
 💕 I just hope the double tap option can manage to minimize the battrey usage, great app.   Full Review   
 Novel idea! I'll use it from time to time but I'll return to my solid black  wallpaper for daily use (I'm very battery conscious). But I do like  it. Imagine the fun once technology discovers/invents an unlimited power source. Cool app.   Full Review   
 Beautiful Work as advertised. I Like it. But there is conflict with double tap on LG G2 because double tapping is lock screen. Please find workaround because I don't want to waste battery. Thanks for the cool product   Full Review   
 Very original Nice work. Unfortunately it does take a lot of battery...still love to show it off...   Full Review
title: Chameleon Color Adapting LWP

reviews:
Cool looking and elegant I love the look of these live wallpapers, there are some great customisation options and amazing themes to start you off. I've not used this long enough to comment on the battery but it would have to eat my battery life for me to ditch such a fantastic looking app.   Full Review   
 Problems on Note 4 with Exynos and higher resolution Upvote so they fix it. Poor framerate on the Galaxy Note 4 with Exynos. Maybe it's not optimized for Exynos yet? It used to run very smoothly on my Note 3 with snapdragon. I absolutely love this app but please fix it!   Full Review   
 Only one thing I'd improve It's a great app and great value. The wallpapers are beautiful and you can change them at will or make your own. Only thing I'd improve are the editing tools. Color tools are a bit strange and editing can be a bit clunky, but I've seen way worse and they are definitely usable if you spend a little time.   Full Review   
 Shaky hand effect I love this wallpaper and it really brings pretty wallpapers to the home screen, but there's one thing that bothers me a bit and could improve - I like the quick movement of objects when I move my phone, but a shaky hand and/or small movement will make everything jitter in an ugly fashion. Maybe a dampening factor could be applied to the initial movement to remove the shaky hand jitters from the wallpaper? This way the objects won't jitter, quiver, and/or shake as I'm holding the phone :)   Full Review   
 Awesome. On a QHD screen the sheer quality of these wallpapers has to be SEEN, very impressive wallpapers and very powerful editing, a little fiddly to use but the results I achieved....are for me amazing.... account sync across devices has been a brilliant blessing, cos editing really needs a large screen. The randomizer is superb, and running my own design's through Muzei with the colours changing every 30 second's brilliant.   Full Review   
 Unstable tilt effect The tilt effect is gone after a while. No matter what I do, I can't bring it back. Only by restarting the phone it will works again. Please fix it   Full Review   
 GREAT! Lock screen? Is there a way to use this and make a lock screen wallpaper? This is an amazig app and I loce it but I really want to have one for my lock screen   Full Review   
 Great live wallpaper On moving to a Samsung S7 Edge found the tilt effect is very jerky, even when set to say less than 14%. Not down rating as the app is still superb even with this bug.   Full Review   
  Went ahead and bought the app. This is exactly what I wanted for wallpapers and it only costs a $1?! No brainier! Amazing app!   Full Review   
 Clocks? Great wallpapers! Where can I find the clocks featured on the photos? Do I download a specific app for them or?   Full Review   
 Live is cool again! I have gotten away from live wallpapers since the Gingerbread days because of the performance hit. I love the accelerometer-driven parallax effect and tons of Material themes to pick from. So far, no performance issues   Full Review   
 Doesn't stay on screen Samsung S6, it will allow me to set the wallpaper and all is good until phone goes in standby,  when you wake the phone it has reset itself to the default wallpaper. Kind of useless.   Full Review   
 Bought for support. The free version already had the theme I was going to use. Had to buy the pro to support the devs. This app is absolutely amazing, only feature I can think of that could be added is the ability to vote themes and organize them by rating, usage, views etc.   Full Review   
 cool cool but the color menu is completly f*ked up impossible to do things properly   Full Review   
 A no brainer Installed the free version, used it for a couple of hours and just fell in love with this app. Its the best wallpaper app, period. And the pro version options are just incredible. Thanks dev!   Full Review   
 Omg.. I love it.. But How to get that clock as shown in image 1?   Full Review   
 Beautiful theme but always disappeared when cleaning recent app. Beautiful theme but always disappeared when cleaning recent apps. Its useless if the wallpaper can't always stick. Too late for refund. :-(   Full Review   
 Fantastic Material Design Background App It has many default designs, which you can customize in many great ways including animation and color. If those aren't enough there's an easy way to make your own and also a way to find more online.   Full Review   
 Love this app!! If you enjoy beautiful wallpapers and love the parallax effects on live wallpapers the get this app now!   Full Review   
 Play time 😆 Create best live wallpaper unlimited creativity.   Full Review   
 Fantastic Would love if we could also use images on the layers as well.   Full Review   
 Optimization problem Ironically it lags even more when I lowered the graphic settings. I can clearly see the lag it brings to the UI when I pulled down my notification bar, the frames suddenly drops down from 60fps to 15-20. It's the only live wallpaper that lags on my phone.   Full Review   
 Looks dope on the Note 5 Dope dope and dope..well worth the purchase 😉   Full Review   
 Good with the limited resources we get I expected now when I first came across the app. I expected regular wallpapers can be vectorised and made into 3d parallax form. I even paid for the full app. However, we have to adjust with only lines and circles and use our ingenuity. Would give 5*s for implementing my request.   Full Review   
 Great Amazing wallpapers. One bug: if you turn the phone beyond the wallpapers capability, instead of stopping it crashes the homescreen.   Full Review   
 The Best Live Wallpaper Collection This is the best app for live wallpapers I've ever used. It complements material design, and very original!   Full Review   
 Suggestion Adding the option to add a blur overlay would be nice   Full Review   
 Best live wallpaper Highly customizable ! Elegant and clean, worth it   Full Review   
 Beautiful Sort of a mind job to realize how powerful the editing tool is!   Full Review   
 I need new words in English We have to find new words in dictionary to define and explain an best app like this. (Best)^infinity   Full Review   
 Cool Great live wallpaper   Full Review   
  Idea is good, but keeps freezing. Uninstalled.   Full Review   
 Wallpapers are awesome.. ..but it slows down my Moto G3. Please fix this problem.   Full Review   
 Superb Why there are few ratings for such a  nice app. Just brilliant.. Day by day it's improving. It does what it say.   Full Review   
  Its a pain to edit walls, but they do look great.   Full Review   
 Prefect Been looking for something like this!   Full Review   
 Phenomenonal This is all you'll ever need from a live  (or even static) wallpaper app   Full Review   
 Pleasing to the eye Wonderfully done. I love the designs.   Full Review   
 Best wallpaper app on the market Absolutely stunning.   Full Review   
  Joko does it again.   Love the parallax / shift effect.  This seems to run much smoother than Light Grid Pro, which is also a great LWP.   Full Review

 cute works like a ziggy phone but no voice   Full Review

title: Device Info Ex Live Wallpaper

reviews:
6.0.1 update Galaxy S6 Buggy since the last update. Most of the time shows a blue led color. The color changes to the right color when the screen is turned on once.   Full Review   
 Good Isnt 100% reliable, but it doesn't detract from the experience and I would still recommend it. Very useful.   Full Review   
 Must Have App! I've been using this app for as long as I can remember. When I get a new phone it's one of the first apps I set up. With my custom notifications set up, I can instantly tell what types of notification I've received without even picking up my phone.   Full Review   
  I am giving this 5 Stars but also warning of a shortcoming on it. I use Lightflow for custom vibrations on Smartwatches, and to also remove the ability for notifications content to show up on the watch.So all I get is  the custom vibration I set for each type of alert and I can tell what type of notification it is without looking. this works great with android wear watches.   The shortcoming is in the Garmin brand watches I have recently switched over to Fenix 3 HR and Garmin connect supports being notified of notifications from 3rd party's so i thought "AWESOME" just add lightflow to garmin connect app so garmin listens for lightflow notifications. However its not that simple. I cant get lightflow to work with garmin watches at all for notification vibs being sent to wearables.  Despite that I LOVE this product I really do extremely useful for modifying how alerts hit you for notifications. I cant tell you how many times Lightflow has stopped me from pulling my phone out because of custom alerts and knowing the notification was not important based on the vib profile.  TO THE DEVELOPER:You get notifications working with Garmin wearables, I will buy a 2nd LF all over to support you.   Full Review   
 Stopped working Since it didn't work on xperia z3 with 5.1.1 I has lg g4,  it worked fine. Now works flawlessly on S6 Edge without suggested workaround.  Changed rating from 3 to 5 accordingly. For those showing only blue led use workaround   Full Review   
  Issues with Galaxy S6/S6 Edge since 5.1.1 update. Dev is looking into it.   Full Review   
 Long time user on all device Recently picked up the S7 edge and it unfortunately does not work. Rating 3 stars as been perfect on other devices. Please update to bring us the support to our s7 series   Full Review   
  I've been using this app for years and loved it, but I just got a new Samsung Galaxy S7 and can't get it to work in any way on it.   Full Review   
  Does not work properly on Samsung S7. Shows all the right colors but still flashes led in sleep mode.  If switched to Samsung workaround lights wont flash in sleep mode, but notification icons persist upon reading a message.   Full Review   
 Works Works well on my devices unfortunately this version does not yet work on Samsung Galaxy S7 with screen always on. Would recommend.   Full Review   
 Continuous Updates,  super FAST support!! 100% absolutely the most valuable Android app I have ever found and my device would be lost without it. Continuous Updates ensure support for the newest devices and apps. This is a MUST have app for every Android user!   Full Review   
 Fantastic It was about time I bought this app. This was one of the first things I scrambled to install after getting a new phone. Its usefulness is unending. Thanks for making this wonderful app!   Full Review   
 Great if you can get it to work Didn't work reliably on my Galaxy S6- I finally (after hours of tinkering and researching) got it working for maybe a day and a reboot seemed to negate the win. Doesn't work on my G5. Not the apps fault per se, but I also don't want to spend hours trying to set up an app meant to save me time and guesswork.   Full Review   
  I love this app, I bought it years ago and they still helped me today when I had a problem with my new phone.   I cannot recommend this app enough.   Full Review   
 ... One of the best apps I've used over the past few years...  Until now!  Just upgraded to the Samsung Galaxy S7 edge and now the app is no good.  Will do the sounds but the led light will not work the colours I want.  Really hacked off to be honest :(   Full Review   
  It messes up with my notifications too much, I had to uninstall doesn't work well on marshmallow.   Full Review   
  Light Flow has been on both my phone and tablet for three years, at least  ,and I love it!   Full Review   
 Handcent Like the app so far, bought the paid version. Can't seem to get hancent to work. Took a while to set the app up but it's nice when you take the time to configure everything. Will give better rating if I can figure out hancent.   Full Review   
 Some stuff needs fixing in the Nexus 6P All of the options work for the app notifications but there are some weird bugs with the app regarding the Nexus 6P. In both the legacy and full version the screen lights up too often randomly as if someone touched the phone. I checked several times and it only happens when the app is enabled. Also, the notification sound sounds twice and overlaps. I haven't figured out how to change that. I had used this app in previous devices but I find these bugs annoying for the Nexus 6P.   Full Review   
 Control! Thanks for control that the apps don't provide over the colors and sounds. Now my LED colors match the app icon color so that I know what update I've got, and the sounds do too (instagram=shutter click, twitter=bird chirp, etc.). Great app!   Full Review   
 Doesn't work properly with Textra It's a solid app however it doesn't work well with Textra rather than the normal Messenger app. Would be nice to have this fixed. When I have the conversation opened it still flashes even though the notification has been cleared.   Full Review   
 Doesn't work on Nexus 5 with the latest update Hangouts doesn't even blink or do anything when I get a message.   Full Review   
 Does not work since software update This was a great app but since the android software update last week it no longer works correctly. When will this be fixed?   Full Review   
 Not working on Samsung note 5 6.01 Hangouts does not send a LED indication.. all other apps work..   Full Review

  No longer works for my Google Apps Gmail account and the labels I have in it.  Works for my personal Gmail still, just not my Google Apps account.  I can't even add the notification.  I choose the account, but it doesn't show up in my notification list in Light Flow.   Full Review

I even uninstalled and reinstalled the app and made sure it had all the needed permissions and I still see this behavior. I'd make this a 5 star if this was fixed.   Full Review   
 Become useless on galaxy s7 Erratic control of led. Needs to be rebuilt for marshmallow. Suddenly stops working. Gets stuck. Workaround or not it's not working.   Full Review   
 Love this app but it barely works on my S7 Edge. Did all of the workarounds but it's still pretty sketchy. Hopefully the bugs get worked out.   Full Review   
 it doesn't work for some odd reason no notification light on my phone.   Full Review   
  Been using Light Flow for at least 6 years love it. The only issues I have are because of Samsung and Android. I would recommend it to anyone even with the glitches. Hopefully Samsung will fix their issues so Reactle can have an App that works 100% again. Hats off to Reactle with trying to keep up with updating the App.   Full Review   
 makes my phone lag I'm getting lots of messages that lightflow is slowing my device...  uninstalled and it was much faster and smoother...  will try to install again   Full Review   
  Works great on my S6 Edge! Unfortunately I need to enable the Samsung workaround, with the non-clearing notification side effect.   Full Review   
 Can't work in Android 7.0 Please solve it.   Full Review   
  Used it for years, great app and never had any problems with it. Only one little thing: I don't know when this stopped working, but facebook messenger notifications always use the general settings. Contact specific settings don't seem to work.   Full Review   
 Disappointed I have this application for over 5 years... Maybe I am one of a few people who firstly bought it...but after the marshmallow update on my s5 I am not pleased at all.. I don't get light notified for many applications that I have on my phone. Pleaseeee fix it   Full Review   
 Pointless Ever since my phone update the apps not worked at all. Annoying after having to pay for it, can it be refunded?? Or fixed??   Full Review   
 Good for nothing. Purchased it mainly for alerting Missed Calls. Unfortunately it never gets notified on my Nexus 6p. Until the developer fixes this issue, it's a waste.   Full Review   
 Not Working Properly After 6.0.1 Marshmallow update in my Galaxy Note 4 its not working properly. I also downloaded the Legency version but after some time its not working. Everytime i need to do uninstall and then again reinstall. Please fix this problem. I'm using this app from long time.   Full Review
title: Light Flow - LED&Notifications

reviews:
Magical Eye Candy [Update 2016; Was really hoping that by now there'd be an option to use a custom wallpaper with the effects....]   Just bought the full version, I'm in love with the colors and was shocked by the wide range of settings. This will be my wallpaper for a long time.   Full Review   
 Love this This one has real staying power. You don't get bored with it.  It is really beautiful and every pattern is as unique as the shapes your finger traces on the screen. Awesome.   Full Review   
 Great App; ONE Issue I absolutely love this app/live wallpaper. It gives my phone a great look and the number of customizable options is awesome. My one complaint is that when my phone restarts, I have to set up the wallpaper again. If that was fixed, then my rating would be five stars. On a side note, it would be awesome to have a fire option to go along with the smoke and water options. It would be sweet to have realistic-looking Mario-style fireballs bouncing across the screen as a live wallpaper. Just sayin'.   Full Review   
 Relaxing and fun I recently bought this app, and it is very soothing and relaxing after a stressful day. It never gets old, and it is quite fun. It also fills a creative need and I have made several backgrounds for my phone and PC with this app   Full Review   
 Please, please Action launcher 3 support? To change colors of the launcher, could you implement one simple api? I will provide the link  Bug: sometimes when i set it as lwp it shows only black screen   Full Review   
 Love playing around with it, but.. I tried using the "set as live wallpaper" button, but it keeps telling me action not supported please set wallpaper manually. So I go to wallpapers and when I click magic fluids it keeps telling me "application not installed" ???   Full Review   
 Help! I love this app, even bought the full version. But my live wallpaper has stopped working 😟 please fix!!   Full Review   
  Second Update: Live Wallpaper works for my Moto X Pure with Marshmallow again. The author said he was working on a fix but offered a refund despite the fact that I've had the app for some time. I decided to wait for a fix, which was provided. The live wallpaper again makes this a fantastic app that's much cooler than any I've previously had.   Full Review   
 epic simply amazing. best value for your money, runs perfectly, on powerful (note 4) and slower (galaxy s3) phones.   Full Review   
 Oh man I forgot all about this app after I got a better device. On the note 5 this is an intense wallpaper!   Full Review   
  Wow, what coolness awaits you! I set up some music, go to this app and WHAMO!   Full Review   
 Too Much Fun I could play with this until I drain the battery on my phone - & I have!   Full Review   
  I've had this app since it first hit the play store. Wow. The latest minor improvements made this even more awesome. I didn't think it was possible. Everyone should utilize this app. It's so fulfilling on so many levels. Thank you!!!   Full Review   
 Amazing! Truly amazing! So beautiful and relaxing. Just what I needed. Love it so much I bought it. The price is so low and the fun is neverending. Thank you for all your hard work!   Full Review   
  I love this app as Live Wallpaper... However, this app has started to not work on my Samsung S7. I rebooted my phone and it stopped (not the first time, but I could get it to work, again). I uninstalled and reinstalled and set the app as Live Wallpaper (works in setup stage). Result: nothing. As I stated: I love this app... I'm pulling for you, Mad Scientist!! Update: Uninstalled and rebooted then installed... Works now!! Afraid to reboot... Wonderful app.   Full Review   
 WOW This is so cool and brilliant as a lwp great work dev 5* easy!   Full Review   
  So i buy the full version because it's meant to be a live wallpaper...Won't work as a live wall paper. Not happy! S6 edge   Full Review   
 Stopped working It worked when I first used it and still works but won't allow me to set as a wallpaper anymore, which was the main reason I downloaded it   Full Review   
 Awesomeness!! Free version awesome. Paid version amazing!! Soo much fun   Full Review   
  this is really a lot of fun I think this would be relaxing during breaks at work   Full Review   
 Guru44 I absolutely love this app. I honestly can say that, not a lot of apps move me to purchase the key for full acess. Thanks magic fluids. My daughter 6yrs loves it too. So she will not talk a lot at my doctors appointments.   Full Review   
 Great Hey, that is the only live screensaver i use since i found it, great - using the full version and enjoing it every day. Thanks for update ;-)   Full Review   
 Pretty sweet Lags occasionally but definitely worth it   Full Review   
 Please, please, please keep updating! The best app!   Full Review

I swear I think I saw Jerry Garcia in one of the swirly psychedelic liquid formations!! Lol, this app is a pothead's dream! :-)   Full Review   
 Like a lava lamp This is like a lava lamp where you can touch and manipulate the wax...so relaxing...I love it. The paid version is well worth the additional options.   Full Review   
 Whoa You can take screen shots while you're junking about but they're incredibly low rez.   Full Review   
 So creative Awesome app that unleashes creativity! Love it!   Full Review   
  Excellent!! great time waster :/ could play with this for hours. (Oh I do :) !!!)   Full Review

 Have made some neat art with this application Love using this app.   Full Review   
 Very Entertaining Good visuals. Great for Entertaining your children.   Full Review   
 Relaxingly trippy Just all around fun   Full Review

 Wow! Absolutely wonderful.   Full Review   
 So addicted I love it.   Full Review   
 Love this! Best screensaver app on the market. The graphics are amazing on s7. Totally worth the battery drainage.   Full Review   
  One word, BEAUTIFUL!!!   Full Review   
 S6 So relaxing.   Full Review   
 Yep It's awesome   Full Review

reviews:
I highly recommend using 3D mode and go to playstore for themes and check this out!!!!  Search "Memscape Next 3D Launcher themes"  amazing quality!!!  Yes all the clocks, go locker, and Poweramp (if you have those apps) ⚠⚠⚠FIX UP YOUR LAUNCHER,, NO UPDATES?!!! ⚠⚠ALL THE WIDGET ADD ONS ARE ALL OLD AND STUPID LOOKING NOW,, AND THE NEED TO BE UPGRADED TO WORK WITH NEW TECHNOLOGY,,, LETS GET GOING HERE,,, WE WANT NEW WIDGETS AND UPDATES,,, I AM WILLING TO PAY!!!!? $$$$$$$$ LETS GO!! ⚠⚠   Full Review   
  The biggest Android bug ever! This UI can actually uninstall itself without warning, without reason and while being the device's active UI. The current version is in bad shape.   Full Review   
 It's ok...but Will you please make a smooth scrolling, waterfall vertical for the app drawer? The page by page is clunky. Vertical yes, smooth (uninterrupted) scrolling no.   Full Review   
  Best app launcher ever...  I recommended it to everyone it is way worth the money. I had this launcher ever since I started getting my galaxy phones thought I was having problems but glad I didn't take it off my phone because it turns out it wasn't this app.   Full Review   
 Version 3.7.3.1 The New BlackBerry Priv Android Version 5.1.1 lollipop == (Android Version 5.1.1.) There Needs To Be An Update To Run This Program On The New BlackBerry Priv ( AT&T). It Lags And Freezes Very Often.. Please Fix .. Thanks   Full Review   
 Sad face.. Random vanished from my phone, i downloaded the patch and it launched then when id try to set it as default it will tell me i needed to download it again then nothing..  Ive been using this since beta and there has been tiny issues here and there but dev team always fixes them so im not giving up hope yet..   Full Review   
  People are jealous. Only "con" is that I'm purchasing 3rd party icon packs bcuz there isn't a theme to cover all my apps. The ones thru Next have only about twenty icons, I'm working with packs that have 2,500  I am working with DC IKONZ and OVO, also RUGO and STEALTH are pretty nice. I'd love your feedback on those if you check them out.   P.s. I might've embellished when I wrote "2,500" lol ... sorry. But still... All of my apps are themed. I tend to find when there isn't an official icon for the app then it's just a themed box with the original icon inside of the themed box. Idk . But you guys after awesome at everything you do! Maybe if the mass icon thing happens, pleeeease send me a link!!!!   Full Review   
 Disappointed! I am unable to add system widgets on the latest android version for my Samsung s6 and this is happening for months now. Still no fix and not a word from support! Reported this every time it crashed which is every time I try to add a widget. The launcher crashes on other instances as well.   Full Review   
 This is perfect I just love the smooth transitions and beautifully designed layout of this launcher. After a few weeks of exploring the settings etc I now have just what I want. Perfect for my Samsung Galaxy Note 3   Full Review   
  I would like to know why the Techo 3D premium does not work? It keeps reverting to something else!  Will change my score once this is resolved.  I just downloaded another theme and it keeps reverting back to same crap   Full Review   
 Fails to show notifications in Android Marshmallow! Even with all settings set to allow notifications, both in phone settings and app settings, Next Launcher 3D fails to show notifications within the app. The accessory app, Next Notification, doesn't work either. The Developer has made no effort to fix this as is shown by the multitude of posts.   Full Review   
  Spent £12 on this crap.  Looks great but it just murders your battery,  nexus 6p 3450mah battery.  Dead in less than a day.  Remove this and that bloody go weather ( which is forcefully bundled with ads) and it's back to 2 and a half days battery.  That's no coincidence. Also pushes you to install go locker,  more bloat more battery hogs.  Combined cost of laucher and weather fifteen pound?  A broken notification in the middle of the screen,  even though notifications are off.  Seriously id like my money back. It's been less than a month.  Dev's also don't answer.   DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!   Full Review   
 Note 5/ lgv10 Take wat i said bak earlier, this app still has a ton of issues one of them is it constantly crashes. No matter what device it's running on.   Full Review   
 Good Launcher But.. It's has a really smooth and good looking UI, only problem is that there are hardly any updates. Now the launcher itself might not need an update as much but the widgets that are made for this launcher are horribly outdated and has received several bad comments on google play. I like this launcher but it seems like it's staying outdated compared to other launchers   Full Review   
 Still have a lot to learn about settings but this does work better on the galaxy series phones  it's crazy how much different each phone can be So far so good still learning to operate but I like far better than standard operating system Setup   Full Review   
 Please fix! Used to be the best! I have been using this for a while and love it. However it won't work with my new galaxy S7 running marshmallow. It either disables the camera or continually crashes. Please fix it so I can go back to using as I can't find another that is as good. Thanks   Full Review   
 Needs improvement! Purchased the app but sooner or later its going to promt that it cant verify my purchase then it will stop to work, need to reinstall and all my settings are gone, need to start from the beginning, what a pain...   Full Review   
 Knackered Been using without problem for years but suddenly Seems to have gone completely to crap.  Screen layouts don't stay put.  Just ends up all muddled when you unlock.  Basically totally screwed.  And no help or reply from development so screw ya's   Full Review   
 Search over. Best launcher EVER. Absolutely LUV this launcher!! Has amazing themes and I get ridiculous number of compliments on my phone. My ONLY gripe I'd actually of extreme annoyance. The icon spacing change entirely too much. So as u add new apps to your homescreen, they normally won't fit correctly with previous apps. Worthy of 2 star loss but I luv the app so much I'll just snatch one. HUGE issue tho   Full Review   
  This is a very good Launcher, though time consuming to set up and with poor documentation.   At £12 it is expensive for an Android app, but not bad value for money for an app that is in use every day  I'd give it 5 stars apart from the fact that is does not hold separate configurations for Landscape and Portrait modes. On my Samsung tablet, I use it equally in either orientation, and although set up and working well in portrait mode, switching to landscape sees the icons all over the place. Other launchers in the past have been capable of applying a different setting between the 2 modes. Hopefully something the developers might consider.   Full Review   
 This launcher is freakin awesome!! I love this launcher. I can basically create my own themes. With my Note5 and Sketchbook app, i can DRAW my own icons!! My Note5 looks like a totally customized phone. I use the 2D version for this. 3D is ok, but not as cool as the fully customizable 2D version. I bought a google play gift card with a bestbuy gift card. Totally worth the price. Really!!!! RUNS SMOOOOOTH!!!   Full Review   
  I really like the look and feel of this app. Love the "3D" aspect. But...  Are the developers done creating themes?  The current selection is nice, but they're getting stale.  Also, the 2-for-1 themes (launcher and lock screen) won't allow application unless you have Go Locker installed. Locker's nice, but, dear Lord is it a battery hog. The current setup means I have to install Locker, apply the theme I want for the launcher, then disable the Locker portion. I'd say "you get what you pay for", but Next is the most expensive launcher I've seen  Until the above issues are remedied, I won't be able to recommend this app to anyone. Especially not at this price point.   Full Review   
 Hopelessly, Happily, Hooked! I've never actually reviewed an app before. In spite of several years of bouncing between launchers using five different devices I always find myself coming back to Next and I've never once required tech support !           It's just a great package at a reasonable price offering a huge variety of experiences, high quality graphics, user friendly format, & emense fun factor.  An all around hard act to follow!                                     Great products deserve recognition!   Full Review   
 Awesomely Cool Best Launcher ever,  great wages, good performance and fantastic themes.  Highly recommended. Invest in the paid version,  it's worth it!   Full Review   
 Slows and freezes my phone I love the idea of this app. BUT, it has three major drawbacks, so I'm quite upset that I spent $17 on it. First, it drains my battery FAST. I went from only having to charge my phone once a day to having to charge it between 5 & 7 times a day. Second, it made my phone incredibly sluggish. Third, my phone froze up A LOT. Do not recommend buying this app especially at the ridiculously high price of $17.   Full Review   
 No support? Very few updates in the last few years. Not many widgets. I was hoping that would improve over the last couple years but hasn't. Notes disappear. Posted about issues and never got a response surprisingly since small free apps have answered my questions or concerns pretty quickly. IDK. Expected more I guess.   Full Review   
 Best launcher I think I've used pretty much every launcher out there but next launcher is I think with out a doubt the best launcher out there so customizable takes a bit of getting used to at first but that's because there's so much in the launcher once you've set it how you like it going to any other launcher will just not do it is a bit pricey but I think  worth every penny as they've crammed so much in to it   Full Review   
 Classic mode 5*/ 3d 3* Love the classic mode! Straightforward simple navigation with plenty of customizations. However, 3d mode and themes are a bit tacky for my taste. Customer support sorely lacking.   Full Review   
 Could Be The Best This could be the best launcher out there. It looks great and has a lot capabilities to personalize. However, it crashes frequently and freezes your phone forcing you to restart.  And it seems like the newest update is worse instead of improved.  I also notice my Samsung Note 4 running hot from time to time. I can't say that the Next Launcher is causing that but it never happened before I had this launcher.   Full Review   
 What Happened? I got the Galaxy S7, and Next Launcher 3D doesn't work, it's just the screen, no icons, no widgets, no nothing!, I switch to Nova Launcher, and that works perfectly... don't buy this launcher until it works perfectly!   Full Review   
 Won't work with the new S7 Edge! Worked yesterday now it doesn't work at all.  Fix for 5 star.   Full Review   
 Same problem Screen rotation rule " position unchanged size may change" is not working in landscape mode note 5. Worked for a short while   Full Review   
 Needs update Instantly force-closes on Verizon Galaxy S6 Edge Plus.  Not usable at all.   Full Review   
 THE BEST!! I've tried so many launchers that I've lost count, but I keep coming back to this 1 because it's perfect for me. I wanna be able to customize my icons like crazy & tweak the hell out of the UI. NEXT LAUNCHER is the ONLY one that allows me to do this -- and more! Love it & I highly recommend it!   Full Review   
  Wow what can I say this just blows me away.Never seen anything like it. The built in features are very rich the things that can be done with it are truly amazing.I have literally spent hours playing with it the possibilities are nearly endless. Battery friendly. I'm like a kid in a candy store. 5+5+5+5.  LOVE IT. Well worth the price, happy that I did. Using this in conjunction with the Zooper Widget pro, you can raise your desktop to the level of art. I'm creating the most amazing themes.   Full Review   
 Enough I gave up  waiting to see next launcher running without issues. It's a shame it has great ideas and potential. Considering its price and how long it has been on the market developers should have fixed all issues, the performance is getting worse, battery drain, freezes, crashing and what else. I would love to stay with next launcher but I am tired of all these problems. I had enough. Switching to Nova launcher   Full Review   
  Have had the paid version for about four years,have always used it as my launcher on all of my devices,however the latest update of March 2016 is very buggy indeed,when I change a theme it only changes the icons,and not the wallpaper,it crashes quite frequently,and is not as smooth in operation as it used to be. This is not a budget launcher,we paid a high price for this,and unfortunately it is not living up to it's reputation....Please fix as soon as possible.   Full Review   
 A World Beater Took a while to get used to it after using wiz for so long, but once I had there's been no going back.. This shell is at the top of the pile when it comes to smoothness, personalisation & of course it's great look.. Tons of free extras to.. Thanx ten million.. Plus 3D mode is VERY cool...   Full Review   
 Looks like many of your 3D effects are gone.      I chuckle when I see 27 special replacement icons when other launcher icon packs have at least 1500. What good is your backup since there's no way to save it to use when on me new phone. Great stuff with lots of options. Please don't go backwards by reducing options cuz the minimal fad will fade.   Full Review   
 Loving It!!!! Still Loving Next Launcher but discovered a slight bug! When I go through my homescreens it's only animating half of the screen! Weird.   Full Review

 Help please I kind of don't understand how to use it, I really wanted it to look like the photos above but its not even close...   Full Review

 Nah Needs other programs just to work.  Just more lazy devs guys.   Full Review

 Definitely the best Pip-boy app! It makes my phone look and feel just like the pip-boy. All I need is to buy the arm band to hold the phone, haha. Sometimes apps don't open when you tap them but I've found that it's due to either this app or the app you are trying to access needing to be updated. Other than that little hickup the app is perfect!   Full Review

Several of the menu options would not allow me to select the visible options, that was pretty frustrating. Other than fixing the widgets, I would only ask for one other feature, and I know it won't be easy. Have a searchable buttons option for when manually selecting them. Use key words or something. At the very least have an index at the beginning to make it easier to navigate. TY   Full Review   
 It's okay Big fallout fan so glad to have this. 4 stars because the weather widget doesn't show the correct city and my header icons didn't change.   Full Review   
  The widget info such as calls texts and battery percentage are off most of the time. Just a bit annoying.   Full Review   
 Great looking theme I not a huge fallout fan but the style and widgets look great. One issue I am having is the battery widget does not update itself, I have to switch it off and on again for the correct numbers, anything I need to do to correct this issue? Another suggestion would be to allow the date on the digital clock link to a calendar app.   Full Review   
 Usually great, but currently... Not so much. Generally it's a great app most of the time, but the current persistent battery issues (yep, they're still here even after the update) are really killing my phone's battery lifespan to the point where I've sadly had no other choice than to uninstall until this gets fixed :-(   Full Review   
 I Love It This looks so great and professional! It'd be nice if there was a way to modify the messages widget to where I could see if I got a new Kik message.  Colour?? Is changing colours really worth 4$?   Full Review   
 Truly high quality theme! Best theme on the market! However, one small issue I have is that you can't seem to change the color of the clock to be fo3 green.   Full Review

 Fallout Fan Theme Great app. Gives my phone a great look. Will go to 5 stars once the digital clock gets fixed. Worked perfectly before update. Now will not allow day of week to be displayed.   Full Review   
 Wow This app is so worth 2 dollars   Full Review   
 Great app, but Works great! Love the look and feel, plus it's easy to customize. Only problem is that the flashlight widget doesn't appear to do anything. Otherwise great app! Recommended for any Fallout fans 👍   Full Review   
 Sweet Theme but please help! I love this theme and the widgets make it great to organize my apps etc. I knew going in that something like this would be a big time power sync. I had it on my note 2 and it was fine. I imported it onto my new Nexus 6 and it worked great! Now, on the same phone it is holding the phone awake and slaughtering my battery. What has changed/how do I fix?   Full Review

I found it very useful, and although some of my friends didn't dig it, well.. who cares! What matters is that I love it, and find it ergo-sexy! Thanks, dev! ★★★★★★ P.S. pure RED 255,0,0 mod pls for night env. tnx!   Full Review   
 Great but... Running on Honor 5x with Android 5.1.1 and unless I restart my phone the Widgets do not update the time, battery life, or weather. I spent hours setting this up just the way I want with Nova and really want to give the 5★ but can't until I know what's causing this problem.   Full Review   
 Nice This is a great skin, especially if you enjoy Fallout. But if you simply want something completely different, you need this. My only complaint is that once you build your widgets, you should be able to lock them without the resizing tool appearing. Besides that, I love it.   Full Review   
 Love it Absolutely love it. A must have for fallout fans. My friends with iPhone's are jealous and every non fallout fans think it looks great. I wish that the clean master one touch clean icon would change to green as well though. Edit : it seems to take up a lot of battery, even without a live wallpaper, so removing one star   Full Review   
 Such a waste of money Awful. It is so hard to use... you need to rechoose everything... and menu is so messed up.. just awful..   Full Review   
 Help me root! Is there like a how to root it especially for this app. Overall it is good.   Full Review   
  I like the app BUT... The weather widget is not accurate, and does not updating automatically. I live in Hungary, and the remperature is allways 10 celsius  inaccurate comparing to other widgets. Also the battery and time widget is 1 or 2 minute behind the system information.   Full Review   
 Dedicated and Great Design Great for any Fallout fan   Full Review

  Still topnotch   Full Review   
  Wicked   Full Review   
 Alright Works as intended. No adverts. I really like the hour-to-hour weather forecast the most! Wish there were widgets for large phone and tablets, as many themes/icons are low resolution and the widget doesn't spread across the screen well. Using LG G3 and Nexus 7.   Full Review   
 Had Beautiful Widgets on my home screen for 7 years. "The widgets are indeed beautiful, absolutely wonderful looking. Very clean and trimmed, absolutely exactly what I was looking for." I wrote that seven years ago, just after I got my HTC G1, the first Android phone. BW has been one of the most popular apps in the Android Market (Google Play Store!) since it was released, and for good reason. It's only gotten better in the meantime!   Full Review   
 After 4 years This is still the best weather and time widget out there after 4 years of using it   Full Review   
 Beautiful! I've been using this app for years now and it's never let me down. It's just fantastic!   Full Review   
  Meh   Full Review   
 Continuously loses sync with local time Despite being a long time user and putting up with having to restart my phone to synchronize the time, I've decided to cease using it.   Full Review   
 Good but.. It's a good software.. It works,  I like how you customize it to your liking.. Although it's hard to work with and is a hair buggy.  Although worth a download.. The interface for the weather details is horrible tho   Full Review   
 Widget disappears after restart I've had this app (bought the pro) for at least four years, loved it and always installed on different phones. Lately anytime I restart my phone the widget disappears... Says "tap to reload" but that does nothing. Really annoying having to ALWAYS re-configure the widget.   Full Review   
 Why do updates wipe widgets? Every time this app updates, I have to redo the widgets. Is it really impossible to make them stay or relaunch after an update? How come other widgets update just fine?   Full Review   
 Works Well. ★★★★☆ I didn't try the open app widgets Does it's job well, it's just not what I want. Daydream works well and I LOVE the windscreen wiper & blowing clouds animations for transitions. The constrained versions of widgets is disappointing, I wish there were layout + button changes to download - not just backgrounds and fonts. ★★★★☆ Thank you for showing me WeatherUnderground - public weather stations are <\i><\b\>great.   Full Review   
 Notification Font Color Please make the notification Font color dark or give us an option to change it. Lollipop notifications are white now so it is not visible. I shouldn't have to ask for this because it is common knowledge by now.   Full Review   
 Phone Is Not The Same Without It I have been using this app for years and no matter how many attempts that I have made to switch things up, BW always makes it back to my home page.   Full Review   
 Crashing ? The post couple days I keep getting a message saying "problem loading widget" I keep have to set it up. It's kinda annoying... If someone could look into it that'd be great 👍   Full Review   
 Clock freezes solid after recent updates I have used this app for years and love it. However, ever since a recent update, the clock freezes solid, rendering it useless.  If this doesn't get fixed soon, i will have to find another clock/weather app, and I'm not looking forward to that.   Full Review   
 Please fix! Have had this app for yrs on different devices with no problems. Loved this app till a few weeks ago. Widget is a ghost widget. When I retrieve the info it still does not fix the problem. Would love to rate higher if problem is fixed...   Full Review   
  Nice enough widgets but a little unimaginative now. Watch out for updates; they kill off your widgets and you have to build them from scratch every time. Geolocation looks like it's broken....and no updates for almost a year   Full Review   
 Weather Widget fails to update now Automatically or manual refresh.   What gives? Droid RAZR MAXX.   Full Review   
 One for the all time list! This was one of my first apps I used on my OD (original droid)! And have been using it ever since! Now mind you that there are other weather apps, that do the weather but not the way this one does! This is often duplicated but could never be replaced!   Full Review   
 Looks Great, Non Functional Widgets look good but they are all non functional half the time. My clock widget will not read the correct time for hours and won't update alarms, and my battery widget lists 100% all day, useless...   Full Review   
 Lovely Nice choice of skins! Only thing missing is a toggle setting for Google drive mode. Update:geolocation is working again, well done!   Full Review   
 Stupid clock freezes I've been a long time user of BW. Been having this issue on and off for years. I love the app, almost too much to ditch it. Using Pro version, now thinking it was possibly a waste of money to purchase. Has potential to be a 5 star app.   Full Review   
  The only widget I use is the clock/weather 4x4. Its been a staple of mine for years. Bought a Huawei P8 and the widget simply doesnt update. Weather doesn't refresh, even the clock stays locked at the time the widget has been applied. Only fix I can find is to force the app to run at all times (even when sleeping). Led me to believe the app is not updating when coming out of sleep, as it usually does.   Full Review   
 Beautiful widgets pro I have had this on all my cell phones in the past and the app always worked great. I have recently upgraded to Galaxy Note 5 and there seems to be some bugs. The widgets no longer keep accurate weather or time. I have to keep restarting my cell phone. Please fix as soon as possible then I will upgrade my review, Thanks   Full Review   
 Like the app but....(problems) I really like the app, there is just some things that need to be fixed before I give 5 stars. 1.) when looking at the themes and you hit download, and scroll down (while downloading) it stops downloading whatever your trying to download. 2.) when looking at the themes and you go to a different app it's starts the themes from the very top. So unless you don't mind loosing your place don't leave the app.   Full Review   
 Used to love this I've spent many happy hours fiddling about getting this widget just perfect for my theme and I loved it. Now I'm on marshmallow it no longer keeps accurate time; it's constantly lagging. No good if the clock doesn't keep the right time. Actually pretty pointless now. Unhappy.   Full Review   
 New widgets don't work. I've had this app for a very long time, have always loved it but now it simply doesn't work. I deleted my widget and tried to place a new one, configured it and hit the check box, the configuration closes but no widget appears. There is still space on the screen where it should be but nothing. I go and check the configuration and it says it's there. So I have invisible clock widget? I cleared the data and cache from the app then uninstalled and reinstalled with the same results. Completely broken please fix   Full Review   
 Yeah, I reviewed this for YOU Great way to make the weather, among other things on your phone Pop.  I remember way back about 5 years ago this being the only app of its kind really it seems , to the near over whelming options of today.  Still holding strong.   Full Review   
 Stopped working, glossy widget Been using it fine forever, last few days is been freezing now it's just a ghost widget. Better fix it soon.   Full Review   
 Time and weather don't update Like the selection and customizability of widgets but often find that the widget breaks after a while on certain launchers (grey box appears and can't load widget). I've also found that in the latest update even when adjusting the update interval in the settings the time, weather and location gets stuck and has to be updated manually. This is kind of a pain. If those things were fixed it'd be back up to a 5-star review until then it just aint...   Full Review   
 I keep hoping I wonder if this app is still being supported I know the community is not active and almost positive this isn't. hasn't been updated since April 2015. Samsung galaxy s6. Would be nice if you could have weather and battery status in the same widget   Full Review   
 Garbage, Doesn't update after phone screen lock Works until your phone screen locks... unlock it and its set to your old time.. the lock screen and status bar clocks both work fine so im guessing it crashes.  If remove and re add widget it works... waste of money.  It should be beautiful clock and weather widget because thats all there is, no calendar widgets etc!!!!!   Full Review   
 Simply, a resource hog. Yes, developer, can you like optimize this app so that it does not suck up as  much 35% of memory resources while putting a heavy drain on the battery. This app is still useful but it has gotten worse as more features are added. Thank you. Last RATING above was three stars. Now, when I hit the weather icon, I get ads telling me that my phone is infected, The widget does not keep correct time.It is the purchased version. Man, this app has become really useless. A sign of an orphaned or abandoned app.   Full Review   
 Last few months doesn't work correctly The time is always incorrect, I delete and reput the widget. Default skins and it just doesn't work, either frozen in time or an hour behind   Full Review   
 An app I regret buying It was great when I initially bought it but now it's crap. The issue of things being too close together on the widgets were never fixed. Not to mention it's clearly not kept up to date even though are still clearly problems.  Just bad.   Full Review   
 Please update weather animation Has always been one of my favorite apps and has been on every device I have owned. Two things that need attention... 1) the notification on 5.1 does not show properly, it shows all in white so it can't be read. 2) one of my favorite features is the weather animation on the app main screen but it has been the same for far too long. It needs an awesome update to keep the app fresh. Developer please look into this.   Full Review   
 Started off nice.. Started off as a great attractive app.. I even bought the pro version, so I could use the awesome live wallpaper... Excellent... So why the  one star- hated it review you ask?... I put the weather widget on my home screen.. The first screen I see, for weather at a glance.. Well I noticed that its much hotter outside than the widget says it is... I then noticed it had not refreshed in 283 hours. And won't update even manually.. So a weather widget app, with broken widgets that are useless is one star-... Fix it and I'll be glad to edit this review.. Thanks for listening.   Full Review   
 Update since Samsung galaxy S3 recent update this app has been force closing, removing my widgets, and I cannot use the Bluetooth, WiFi widgets. also is causing my phone to be sluggish   Full Review
title: Beautiful Widgets Pro

reviews:
High res/cropping options! thank you for making this the most realistic and beautiful water effect live wallpaper, could you please add the option to have a portrait mode cropping and fullhd resolution background? It just looks so pixellated on newer phones   Full Review   
 Add many more things I really love this app but it needs an update to app many more things. They should add turtles,frogs,Insects,water falls water control,many more plants and other fish such as common pond fish and new themes   Full Review   
 Beautiful. Request. Can you add an option to automatically cycle through the backgrounds like once a day? That way every day the fish will swim in a different environment. Otherwise, gorgeous. Also find a way to point users from the free app to the paid app. Took me a while to find it and I almost gave up finding the paid version.   Full Review   
 Best ever wallpaper! Once you pay the 99 cents, you can pick your background, lighting, water effects, fish and their sizes, even make lighting change with the time of day, FEED the fish with multiple taps...best ever! If you tap a fish it rushes off!      Same goes for their aquarium except you can't pick fish sizes there, but if you pick 2 of the same type of fish or two turtles, jellyfish or seahorses, they won't be the same size. I'm back to buy more of Kittehface's I love them so much... Cell & tablet download for 1 buy!   Full Review   
 Gorgeous lwp I love this koi pond wallpaper. It is so beautiful and realistic. Looks amazing on my tablet. I also love that you can feed the fish. Very cool!   Full Review   
 Wonderful but could be better. Everything about this wallpaper is spectacular EXCEPT the resolution of the background. Any wallpaper you set just looks terrible on today's HD devices even when specifically providing images in the recommended 1024x512 resolution.   Full Review   
 THESE DON'T SMELL FISHY I've always loved going fishing . Catch and release fishing . And... I've always found Koi Fish fascinating and beautiful . With this app there's so many backgrounds and the color and sizes of fish you choose . Also you can play with these by just simply touching them . After you touch their tails they take off swimming very quickly . I choose the full version because it's simply better with more features . I would advise fish lovers to have this app along with anyone else . Kids ,people who landscape, ect.   Full Review   
  Great live wallpaper. I did not realize that the Koi fish would be swimming under the icons on my screen. I thought it was just a screensaver. I guess that's what the live wallpaper means. Great surprise. It is worth many times the 99 cents that it cost. I put this app on both of my Android devices. Great app.   Full Review   
 No hi-res background? The background is still low-res even though I manually pick a hi-res image.   Full Review   
 Stands test of time I find myself always coming back to this live wallpaper. Customization of koi fish is great. Only improvement i can think of is support for higher resolution backgrounds. Will this be possible in some future update?   Full Review   
 Lovely Though the way the fish move is a biy unrealistic I love the customizable interface. Lots of fun to be had.   Full Review   
 BEST & MOST BEAUTIFUL Live Walpaper ever! Totally worth paying for full version. Just purchased the full version of the Koi Live Wallpaper. I had the free version on my Samsung Infuse many years ago, and loved it; there's nothing that conpares, as far as live wallpapers go.  I later tried to install it on my Samsung Galaxy Note 2, without success. I just found the free version again yesterday and installed it on my Galaxy Note 4, it's absolutely gorgeous! This morning noticed that the full version was $0.99, and couldn't pass it up. Thanks for this beautiful wallpaper!   Full Review   
 Ridiculous that you haven't fixed the glitch yet! I won't buy anymore of your product until you show me you care about your customer. I downloaded this over a month and a half ago and love it but I'm super frustrated that my glitches still haven't been fixed! It's glitching out on my note 4 but works fine on my lg tablet.  On the note, I can't personalize the background, it just stays on one that's provided . I also think it's hard to customize the fish because the select is hard to see.   Full Review   
 Was 5 stars but now 1 star This app is in desperate need of a major update! Was great back in 2012 on my galaxy s2 but now its 2015 and phones are qhd now... it looks terrible... u guys seem to have given up on development   Full Review   
 YAY! So happy to see this old favorite available for my android. Only one problem: when I had it in the past it cycled through the day/night cycle correctly, but now it's out of sync. For instance, right now it's in sunset, almost night, but the sun won't set here for another 2.5 hours. Any way to adjust that? My location is on. Not a big deal, but in the old days I loved sitting outside with a cup of tea, watching the rosey sunrise mirrored by my koi pond. Very realistic and relaxing!   Full Review   
 The Top live wallpaper Been using it for years, Nothing out there better in my opinion .   Full Review   
 I LOVE this app Works great on both my Samsung S5 and TabS. It's peaceful, relaxing and great graphics. I can't express how much I love this app. I have a blank screen on my tablet just so I can watch the fishes. And I have a blast feeding them and then watching my cats try to catch the Koi as they swim to the next screen and disappear. It's a blast!   Full Review   
 Love it on my Lenovo tablet Installed on my Lenovo 10 tablet and it's 100% working. Lovely display very pleasant to watch. Note on my Lenovo it would disappear from the screen after powering the tablet off. I found this was because I had installed it on my SD card, transferring it to the tablets internal memory completely cured this. Great app.   Full Review   
 One of my favorites I'm running this on an S4. It ran great on 4.4.2. I thought it was causing battery drain on 5.01 when that update rolled out. I had factory reset before the udpate and right after the udpate (based on issues I read about). After a few tweaks and restarts (do this every a.m.) the phone seemed to be fine with battery life again so I installed this app again. Been running fine since. Love it!   Full Review   
 good ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡ ♥ ♡   Full Review   
 Love this Wallpaper It's very soothing to watch with realistic animations and skins. It doesn't drain my battery in any ridiculous kind of way, either. The only thing that would make it better would be of the lily pads and flowers were on a layer above the water so they didn't ripple when you tap the surface or when you have the rain setting on.   Full Review   
 Beautiful But Unreliable This is a beautiful and realistic looking app. I felt as if I had pets that I don't have to clean up after.  However, even though I paid for the premium version it keeps disappearing from my screen. Just now I went into the settings to restore it-  TWICE - and nothing happened. I still have the default wallpaper. At this point I don't have what I paid for. Please fix this or I will have to uninstall and demand a refund. Otherwise, if it stayed put I would be more than happy to give it five stars.   Full Review   
 Great but could be Awesome One of the best live wallpaper. It runs perfectly smooth and the fish swim naturally. There are a lot of different customizations. This app is definitely worth buying. You will not be disappointed. However it would be nicer if the backgrounds were HD and on my Galaxy S3 I can no longer set custom backgrounds, please fix this.   Full Review   
 Worked great.....until lollipop Since lollipop, I can change wallpaper to koi, but it does not stay there, it just disappears. I miss my fish!   Full Review   
 Android 4.4.4 MotoG I Dig Your Apps...!!! Perfect For my QuadCore..Battery Use Acceptable. I've Taken All Your LiveWallpapers Download... All Work Great. Faved Orb (DarkSettings). 👍🚀✌🐯🆒   Full Review   
 Absolutely Exceptional Where do I start!? First off, what is cooler than having a koi pond as your wallpaper!?!? In this app, you can choose from 9 different koi fish, change environmental backdrops, decorate the pond with flowers and lily pads, make it rain and...I kidd you not...have your wallpaper...change times depending on the time of day. I could even size the koi fish however I wanted and customize the backdrops and colors of the times of day. You can even make ripples in the water as if you were actually touching it! Despite the slight bad quality of some of the environment backdrops, this Koi live Wallpaper was exceptional! Definitely worth the $0.99...   Full Review   
 Great Really love this wallpaper.  Lots of people have commented on it.  In this particular version though the section to edit the fish has become really small to see what you are editing.   Full Review   
 Love this This is the first app I've purchased and its wonderful. I love all the settings there are. The only thing that would be nice is if the pictures of the fish were a little bigger in the settings section. They are hard to choose when they are so tiny. Still well worth the money overall. Thank you for such a great app.   Full Review   
  This is the best wallpaper! When you finally get board of all your pathetic games and apps, buy this, you'll FINALLY get off your stupid MCPE and Facebook, and finally know the real meaning to life! Well, no, but the point is it's really good!   Full Review   
  WHAT A FANTASTIC LIVE WALLPAPER IT'S THE BEST RELISTIC ONE I HAVE EVER SEEN AND I NOW HAVE A NICE SELECTIONS OF LIVE WALLPAPER NOW WITH THE BUTTERFLY SPRING ONES THIS ONE IS WELL WORTH THE LITTLE AMOUNT THEY ASK FOR WELL RECONMENDED AND WELL DONE AND THANKS ANY ONE WHO LIKES THESE (PLEASE GET IT YOU WON'T REGREAT IT )GOOD JOB U GUYS KEEP THEM COMING CHEERS X   Full Review   
 Bloody brilliant! This live wallpaper is well worth the 60p i like the way you can change wat fish you want an size you want an wen you feed them looks so realistic :))   Full Review   
 Needs work on updating to higher resolution phones Water effect looks good. Backgrounds are not HD, at least for newer phones. Sad to see custom background is even worse. Makes HD wallpapers look messy with it too far zoomed in. Love the day and night effect though, it is the one killer feature I wish came with nearly all live wallpapers. Though this LW has had its days it needs to be updated. When it is I will start using it again. Just fix the background resolution and most importantly custom wallpapers. But thank you for the beatiful (ish) app.   Full Review   
  Have new Note 4 and can no longer set custom background, used to be able to do this on other devices. Please fix and I will gladly change my rating back to 5 stars. Thank you   Full Review   
 Beautiful The water ripple effects are amazing. The ability to customize koi, plants, flowers, lighting, rain,  and background make this the BEST wallpaper I have ever used. Worth every penny.   Full Review   
 Koi Locks up when tablet goes into sleep. After you have a black background... have to restart tablet for it to work again   Full Review   
 So realistic! This app is so fun feeding the Koi, changing their size, and changing background! The rain drops and tapping the water to feed them is pretty entertaining for kids & adults! We have fun decorating the tank! Can't beat This app & hope you'll enjoy it as much as we did !!   Full Review   
 Great app with one Bug It would be 5 stars if it wasn't for the annoying bug that doesn't let you change your custom backround once you have already done it.   Full Review   
 So relaxing! It's relaxing and  fun I love it ! Five stars !   Full Review   
 Love it!!!! Worth every penny!!  No glitches,  never gets boring. So soothing to watch.  Love the different size and colours of fish to choose from,  and backgrounds!!!  Love feeding them too lol...  Nothing beats this live wallpaper!!!!   Full Review   
 Koi Best koi / aquarium app I've seen and the 1st one I paid for!  Still not sure how to use it for lockscreen also?   Full Review

  Beautiful!   Full Review   
  nice app   Full Review

 Works very good Pro does wat its supposed to do other people just don't know how to use it I think its better than touchpal keyboard   Full Review

Paid App has many adjustable settings such as daylight / dawn / dusk / night-time light levels, numbers of clouds, and rain or no rain.  Lightning flashes can be set to random colors, and they can be set to flash where you touch the screen (I turned the latter off).  For me (and I'm cheap), the $0.99 was well worth it.
