  I am a huge fan of space, planets, galaxies, black holes and all the like, so it is not surprising that this live wallpaper caught my interest. What is surprising is that it managed to blow my (high) expectations out of the water. Its visuals are quite simply the best I have seen in Google Play Store, with many galaxies being so absorbing that you don't really want to use your phone but just stare at the background...  The customization is good enough, with many different presets that can also be randomized and a lot of visual options to choose from. It is also worth noting that you can set an automatic timer for a background switch, which is nice if you like variety. The battery-saving options are a bit lackluster and I wish there was a way to preview how the galaxies look (the Alien Shapes live wallpaper did that perfectly). Lastly, the battery consumption of Galaxy Pack is also within reason, it will not destroy your battery % even with all the extra options turned on. Well worth the money, I hope they make a PC version some day.   Full Review

I then have to disable & reenable for it to work again. Please fix this bug for 5 star rating. Thank you.   Full Review

 Bravo, Mr. Kettler I've had this app for less than twenty-four hours, and, even as miserly as I am, I pressed 'purchase'. I do not mind supporting devs who clearly have talent. My, wouldn't I love to see the code behind this gem. Hats off to you  sir!                                   ~Rick   Full Review

I have yet to check if it's a battery hogger but it's worth it.  You can also zoom in and out and rotate to your hearts content.  Seriously, this is what live wallpapers are all about.  EDIT:  Now I'm spoiled. Any chance of adding Lens Flare from the Sun?   Full Review

 Brilliant Had the free version but wanted that little bit extra so bought the Pro version and for 99p you can't go wrong. It looks absolutely stunning on my phone and I love it.   Full Review

 Vitthal Very nice apps , I would request you to add some planets and graphics also , Again very very thanks to you sir.   Full Review   
 Epic! Awesome live wallpaper. Highly customizable. The parallax effect is super trippy. I'm happy to pay 99c for the ability to change earth's rotation speed   Full Review   
 Magnificent. For one dollar, I get the trip of my life in space. The Earth and space is so realistic. Though the Earth rotates, what about the Moon, does it orbit around the Earth? Also. I wished the Earth would rotate timely with the clock. I tried setting it as slow as I could to make it rotate to match the time my country passes a day but could not synchronize it with the clock. Over all, it's a beautiful app.   Full Review   
 Richard Awesome and worth 1GBP. A must have live wallpaper.  Just keep opening my phone to look at it.   Full Review   
 Moon& earth I 💘 this wallpaper live allot its a fun app its worth it having a pro ☝ get it you won't regret it.....have a 👍 day people.....   Full Review   
 Works perfectly on my Samsung Galaxy Light: quad-core ARM Cortex-A7 CPU@1400 Mhz, quad-core Mali 400 GPU, KitKat 4.4.2. This is a fantastic app! As is the one for Mars. I can't imagine how much coding this must have taken to achieve the level of realism, detail, and smoothness present in these apps. Thank you for the effort. You are to be applauded.﻿   Full Review   
 Moon Earth 3D Pro is a 5star app The gyroscope,hi-definition + 3D is the best live wallpaper to date   Full Review   
 Best live wallpaper I've ever seen. It looks amazing. It's a highest quality live wallpaper I've ever seen. What a great application. I'm using pro version of it and I really like it 😊   Full Review
title: Earth & Moon in HD Gyro 3D PRO

reviews:
Cute does not mean dumbed down! Besides being absolutely adorable in all its little details, including the little animations in the stars or the way birds and cars and whatnot move, it's customizable enough to satify the most mental control freak and keep you entertained for a while just playing around with the endless settings, while having a good selection of pre-made themes if you just want to have a cute wallpaper out of the box. I used to be put off by the permissions, but they're just for the live weather and the moon phases (both of which can be turned off and have a ton of options - everything has a ton of options). It's been my favorite wallpaper for a while and hasn't stopped being so; I always end up coming back to it.  P.S. - I wrote this in 2014. It's 2016 and this still is my wallpaper. If I could give it 6 stars I would, just for that.   Full Review   
 Like it, but needs work Really want to like this wallpaper, but it is a cpu hog. It completely drained my phone's battery overnight and constantly pulls it out of deep sleep. Definitely needs some work.   Full Review   
 I love it. Got it when I first bought my phone, and have had it as my wall paper for the whole 2 years I've had my phone.   Full Review   
 Excellent I'd like to have an option to automatically switch between seasonal themes   Full Review   
  I love everything about this, except that I can't be evil. Oh, how I want to poke the trees to set them ablaze, and make the cars explode, and make the birds fall dead out of the sky, and send the balloons into Hindenburg mode... Let me poke all the things!   Full Review   
  Love this wallpaper! Not too fond of cars, so I don't have many. I'd give five stars if we can have more people and some (or lots!) domestic animals like dogs, cats or even cows and horses!   Full Review   
 Wth!! Why doesn't the forecast ever show!!?  I've already installed uninstalled and restarted and nothing!   Full Review   
 Add Famous Landmark City Themes E.g. Eiffle Tower in a Paris Theme, CN Tower in a Toronto Theme   Full Review   
 Love the app Please let us have big trucks and palm trees   Full Review

 Was A Favorite This was a favorite live wallpaper for a while until I notice like a day after i'd set the theme I like, it kept returning back to the phones default wallpaper.  😒 please fix this.   Full Review

 Best live wallpaper! Everyone who sees my phone loves my wallpaper and wants to know what it is? I love this app.   Full Review   
 Still awesome. Original and best. Still my favourite wallpaper of all time and well worth the cost.   Full Review   
 Best! Simply awesome wallpaper. Worth the money!   Full Review   
 Awesomeeee Best live wallpaper on google play. Doesnt eat battery.   Full Review   
 Awesome live wallpaper It would be nicer if I could set different intervals based on if my phone is plugged in or not.  But still, definitely best live wallpaper!   Full Review   
 Great Possibly add more animals?   Full Review

 First app I ever bought. Still love it.   Full Review   
  Fix the live weather for s7 edge   Full Review

 Saint Patrick's Day! I love the skipping leprechaun! The green theme, the rainbow...it's all amazing!   Full Review   
  So much fun!   Full Review   
 ★★★100 Stars ★★★ Best Live Wallpaper : D   Full Review   
 Pretty Enjoyed the cuteness and mostly used it as my daydream   Full Review   
 Wow Excellent. Perfect for your home screen.   Full Review   
 I love paper town. This background is adorable.   Full Review   
 Love this Great wallpaper guys many options   Full Review   
 Love it! outstanding!   Full Review   
 Cool :)   Full Review   
 Love the App, have a problem with it. Like I said above, I do love Paperland. I do, however, have an issue with one of the themes. I use the Desert Migration theme and have noticed that the day and night cycle seems to be random. It doesn't show day time if it is day time outside the way it does with other themes. Hoping you can fix this bug so I can give you a five star!   Full Review   
  Very nice wallpaper anyway. Problems:  1, When I change anything in the scenery or change a theme, it doesn't change. Instead I see a black home screen (as if I put black screen wallpaper there). I have to restart the phone for changes to appear and the live wallpaper to work again.  2, The weather is not accurate. I live in Zilina, Slovakia (I use custom location because of battery issues). The Latitude is 49.2228 and Longitude is 18.7400. This is correct from google and map. Why my weather doesn't show snowing / raining, when it snows / rains?  If you fix these 2 issues, I'll give you 5 stars . Edited to 1 star - the weather still doesn't work right at all. Still "Mostly Cloudy", even when I see that it changes in accuweather hourly weather.   Full Review   
 Aurora You know what would be really cute if they added an aurora for the night time so the tundra would look like the north/south pole!!! With custom colors 😍   Full Review

 Constant delight Never boring - creative and amusing. The updates are fun which keeps it fresh without any functional issues...great!   Full Review

 I've had this for a year Worth every penny. Can customize for special occasions.   Full Review   
 Fantastic I have given up on looking for a better wallpaper!   Full Review

reviews:
Disappointed! This app used to be great when it was free so I didn't mind paying. But now you can no longer finds flights by flight number, only departure and arrival city. Also when you share the flight info the times aren't listed anymore. The other person has to click on a link to find out your arrival and departure times. Needs updating   Full Review   
 Wonderful app! I enjoy the app! It does give real time tracking. I don't know why people give this app bad ratings but all people need to know is the real time status, flight numbers, airports, beginning flight, and destinations. No average person need to know every detail except the things I mentioned above. This app is all people need expecially if your not a tech-savvy person. My guess is mostly those who are not tech-savvy complains about the app.   Full Review   
  Upgraded  from the older version when it was on special offer. The UI is improved but that where it ends. Forwarded my EasyJet flight confirmation (an airline that is on there approved list). Got an email back saying unable to update information to the app I would have to add in manually.  I did this by putting in the dates and the flight numbers etc. The departure and arrival times are completely different from the schedule and you are unable to manually amend them (I might add that Tripit had no problems picking up my confirmation email from my inbox and putting the correct information in their app).  Emails to Flight Track support go unanswered, so if you are thinking of upgrading to get all the bells and whistles I would think again.   Full Review   
 Unethical developer I bought the Flight Track from Mobiata for 5$ sometime back. They have removed that from the Play store and added this instead - Flight Track 5. I'm not going to keep giving 5$ every time they change their app. It's not like they closed down... I feel it's very unprofessional. I want to also mention that the earlier version was much cleaner and better. The new version seems all cluttered.   Full Review   
  Sadly this app is not reliable anymore. Just check one flight that have ben delayed 1h30 and FlightTrack is telling me it is already landed. The airport website and Google both know the update info...  Really not worth the 5$.   Full Review   
 Add flight option not streamlined In a single trip, there are two redundant options "Add another flight" at the bottom and a "+" at the top. Both does the same thing. Would be easier when selecting the bottom option to save the new flight in the same trip rather to have to ask me everytime if I wanted to do so. Since you have 2 buttons to add flight, make it easier to use one to continuously add flights in the same trip. Super annoying.   Full Review   
 This is trash, unstable and unusable If you pay for something it should work.  Since I purchased this app it hasn't worked.  It no longer open.  It crashes and slows down the phone.   Full Review   
 Crash This app is not working properly and very unstable when connected to Expedia's Tripdeck: Experiencing a lots of crashes when opening app on Redmi 2 android based MIUI 7.1.1 while logged to Expedia's Tripdeck.   It is not crashed when not logged to Expedia's Tripdeck. Tried hard reset and reinstalling app; it didn't solve issue if logged with Expedia's Tripdeck.   Full Review   
 abandoned Mobiata seem to have completely abandoned FlightTrack and FlightBoard, and only keep them around to swindle the odd sale from unlucky folks like myself. Do not buy.   Full Review   
  It would be nice if the app could also REMIND/NOTIFY YOU TO CHECK IN the flight either 24 hours or 48 hours or even to set a specific time to remind me.   Full Review   
  Very few info in Europe. I heard this thing is amazing in the US. However, in Europe, I have inserted about 10 flights and for none of those the app could tell me the departing gate, or any other useful information really that was useful for my flight. I had to to on the airport app.   Full Review   
 Force closes on S6 edge & Nexus 6 Unusable. Rebooted, reinstalled twice and still doesn't work. Refund button doesn't seem to exist. Wasted €4. Devs: seems to be a problem once you turn on auto-calendar sync.   Full Review   
  Old version worked great and tied to Trip-it.  Now I can't get to the old version or my loaded flights after upgrading my phone!   Full Review   
  Add to calendar not working. Swipe to delete too easy to trigger, wish there's an option to disable it. An option for default view would also help, I'd like to keep trip histories but not show them by default.   Full Review   
 Excellent flight tracking!! This is an excellent app to track the flights actually the whole trip. Getting the info about the seat map etc is an added bonus. Hope to see more features added to this app. Keep it up!!   Full Review   
 Unfinished terminal maps? Terminal 2 @ ORD, shows gate F14 as final gate, but there are more, makes me wonder about the accuracy of all the maps or if it's just that one that is wrong.   Full Review   
 Mostly useless. Gate information doesn't work, and it's slow to update flight status.   Full Review   
 FT5 on HTC One M9 These people are crazy, this app works beautifully. I used the old flight track for years and finally upgraded to this one and LOVE it. Great ui, no crashes, very detailed info, and easy to use. Great app.   Full Review   
 C Harris I really enjoyed version 4.5.2.  Just purchased this version.  Not sure why I had to pay again after getting Galaxy 6 phone upgrade.  I will give this one a fair shake.    UPDATE.......As of 3-25-16. Disappointed.   System is frequently unable to process request, and frequently not available.   Not happy.   One star. :(   Full Review   
  Use this app to track all of my travel for work.  The Tripdeck functionality is pretty fantastic.  Nice job   Full Review   
 Still no cloud based syncing for multiple devices....... Tripdeck is a junk feature..... ... Lazy development team...How hard can it be in 2016 to sync data between two devices? You seem to be hell bent at clinging onto "Tripdeck", presumably as a potential source of revenue from Expedia, whilst at the same time ignoring users who have paid twice already for this app. And you wonder why your average score is below 4 on both ios and android. 0 stars. Edit: no updates in 6 months? Given up? No loss. Enjoy my $5.   Full Review   
 Not accurate You have to know the flight #😕 what happened to the destination search option?   Full Review   
 Great app The map background doesn't load anymore.   Galaxy s7   Full Review   
 Suggestions Let us make notes on trips or change who is the traveler. Especially on Tripdeck synced trips, on those you can't change who is on the actual flight, even if I'm just tracking a flight to pickup people.   Full Review   
  Timezone issue when adding flight via tripdeck. It ignores timezone for example if I send a 2 legs flight London to Bangkok, Bangkok to Krabi  they are displayed as Krabi to Bangkok and Bangkok to Krabi all GMT time. in app options are selected show airport local time   Full Review   
 Worked for me Hadn't had any issues. Installed on Note 3 after I had just reset my phone to factory settings. Worked before and after the reset.   Full Review   
 Worthless Does not track flights, just draws a line between start and end point and then position by time. You would be more accurate with a paper map and a pencil. My wife's flight had a one hour diversion to avoid France. FlightTrack showed her going over France and landing an hour before she actually did!   Full Review   
 Best flight tracker available I often get updates on gate changes and delays before the airline app, or sometimes before the board at the airport changes. Works well in airplane mode, giving estimated times based on previous information. Money well spent for the frequent traveler.   Full Review   
 Ugghh 2 years since material design was introduced, this app still rocks holo !   Full Review   
 Flight delay estimation gone? Previous version used to have a estimation on possibility of flight delay, but where can I find it on version 5?   Full Review   
 flight tracker luv this app. no problems whatsoever.   Full Review   
  Disappointed. The old version (which I paid for) was much better. Dont like the new format, the list layout was much better. Also not happy to have to pay for the same app again when an update came out. Was one of flight tracks biggest fans. Also, Delta flight gates no longer show up.   Full Review   
 Flight track The best out there!   Full Review   
 Shite You can't even enter a flight (Jetstar)   Full Review   
  Solid application, but could do with integrations to TripIt as well.   Full Review   
 Simplicity Why can't i just speak the flight and have it track it?   Full Review   
  Always very helpful.  I travel alot.   Full Review   
  I'm an AA flight attendant, and I've tried all the apps. This one offers the best interface and best features of them all.  I love how it says the flight time, and time remaining and alerts me anytime something changes in realtime.  I use this every time I go to work, plus my wife knows where I am because it syncs with the calendar. Obviously everyone involved put a ton of thought into this product.   Full Review   
 Attitude of Developers seems to be an issue Many of the recent reviews for this app are quite negative and it appears the developers do not care and are simply doing whatever they please.  Meanwhile users repeatedly report bugs, removed features, etc... Yet it seems the developers still don't care.   They may respond to review comments and say they do, yet where is the proof, such as fixes and reintroduction of popular removed features??   Full Review

The image quality of what I assume is the flagship theme - the nebula - is very low. The stars are poorly cut out so you see black ghosting around the edges. The only saving grace is the water droplets which seems pretty good. Unfortunately there is the occasional laggy jump - which on a Nexus 6P is very poor. Sadly I can't even seem to get a refund.   Please have more options for customized background. It crops in too much regardless of size of the background. Would be nice to have an option so it doesn't crop and lose a lot of the image.   Full Review   
  Love this app! Lots of fun to play with, and now I have a 3d Okami wallpaper for my phone!   Be advised- to make your own wallpapers you need at least some graphics experience.  I hope that this will continue with development because there are some additional features I'd pay a couple bucks extra for. I'd like to have more than three layers. It would also be neat if they could build in some sort of blur by layer so the foreground is in clearer focus than the background.  The main thing I'd like though, is the ability to save wallpapers on my device so I can have multiple different ones to use without having to set them up every time. Or the ability to share papers with friends who also have the app without having to upload it to the gallery.   Full Review

Also, I live 3 hours from my  favorite team and I'm blacked out constantly when they are game of the day. I'm 5 hours from Cincinnati and constantly blacked out there as well. Completely frustrating, blackouts are a joke!   Full Review   
 At Bat 2016 update is terrible The 2016 update has rendered this app useless for my Android devices. Support is also terrible. Not supported for Samsung Galaxy Tab S? Seriously? I can watch some of a game and then it will continously freeze so often that I give up watching in frustration. It won't work on my Xperia Z2 either. The list of android tablets supported is about 2 long. Ridiculous. It doesn't work either on cellular connection or via WiFi. I can only use it on my PC by leaving it out of full screen mode. I've reverted back to the old player which is thankfully still available. But I mainly bought my subscription to watch it while travelling to and from work. So I have pretty much wasted the $150 I paid. Given the support I have received via email it is obvious MLB cares nothing for its customers. Oh yes and did I mention that watching a game now uses so much data that I can only watch a handful of games a month where before the update during spring training I was watching 5 games or more a week. 60 fps is nice but I would rather be able to watch more games.   Full Review   
 Ads to loud! I've sent in a ticket for this several weeks ago and haven't heard anything. I have to play the radio at full blast to hear the broadcast. Then the ads are twice as loud and I have to turn it down. Very frustrating. If there is no change after this season, I will be unsubscribing.   Full Review

Android users get none of these features and I can't understand for the life of me why these features are not available for Android users!  This is a 5 star app otherwise.  I am a premium member going on 5 years and feel like Android users are getting the tail end of things by having these features neglected from the app's updates.
